name: Easy Style - Dress Up Game
description:
Easy Style is the new dress up game from the developer of Easy Poser, a popular tool selected by 750 million artists! Decorate the avatar girl of your own and brag about it to your friends.

★ Features ★
- Easy Style is a game you can decorate charming 3D avatar girls.
- Numerous costumes and accessories are ready for your fun. Variety of ways to dress them!
- Let’s try many makeup items including eye shadow, blusher, and mascara!
- Shaggy cut, Bob cut, Semi-long, Wiggle head, and a lot more hairstyles plus dozens of hair colors you can dye them!
- Take a life shot of the girl you decorated with countless camera angles and poses.
- Decorate your avatar with your own style and share it with your friends.

★ Notice ★
- When you log in Easy Style, the user ID and billing information are encrypted and stored on the server. (Why we collect your information: To resolve the issues such as payment errors.)
- If you change the device to Other OS devices after purchasing a paid item, you cannot use the purchased item. Purchased items will be linked only for the Android phone/tablet.

★ Permission (usage) ★
- Storage: Permission to save the game screen to the mobile phone gallery. (Critical/Required)
